name: TwoTooBig
description:
A WINDOWS GAME

This game isn't big enough for the two of us.

  • Twin sisters face off in a deadly game of Catch the Egg.
  • Destroy the floor space or waste your target directly, while they try and do the same.

REQUIREMENTS

  • This is a split screen 2 player game.
  • There is no single player option.
  • Player 1 uses the keyboard.
  • Player 2 MUST use an X box (or x-input) controller.

CONTROLS

  • Player1 Look MOUSE
  • Player1 Movement WASD
  • Player1 Jump SPACE
  • Player1 Aim LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (HOLD)
  • Player1 Fire LEFT MOUSE BUTTON (Click or Release)
  • Player2 Look RIGHT ANALOGUE STICK
  • Player2 Movement LEFT ANALOGUE STICK
  • Player2 Jump X
  • Player2 Aim R1 BUMPER (HOLD)
  • Player2 Fire R1 BUMPER (Tap or Release)
  • QUIT GAME ESCAPE
  • RESTART MATCH R

OPERATING SYSTEM : WINDOWS. Download and Extract the ZIP file, then run the TwoTooBig Executable. The game runs with just one player, but victory will be hollow.
